H0.text: Elizabeth Gaskill based her fictional village 'Cranford' on which place in Cheshire. Wilmslow

H1.text: Elizabeth Gaskill based her fictional village 'Cranford' on which place in Cheshire. Nantwich

H2.text: Elizabeth Gaskill based her fictional village 'Cranford' on which place in Cheshire. Macclesfield

H3.text: Elizabeth Gaskill based her fictional village 'Cranford' on which place in Cheshire. Knutsford

A4.text: The fictional Cranford is based on the small Cheshire town of Knutsford in which Elizabeth Gaskell grew up.
